text.0: The exact nature of a wala, which seems to be an ornamental as well as useful part of the helmet, is not known. Stjerna (2 f.) guessed that " there was an inner head-covering of cloth, leather or the like . . . and that this was fastened to an outer convex plate" (wala). Cf. Rie. Zs. 392-4; Bu. 369; Falk L 9.44.158
